ai.summary: A very short, easy circuit in the UK connecting Muir to Clash, spanning 0.3 km. Ideal for a quick stroll, families, and absolute beginners looking for a low-effort outdoor experience.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained trails with occasional grassy edges. Minimal elevation change; expect some damp or muddy patches after rain. Suitable for light footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Even on a short route, carry basic outdoor safety gear. Check the weather before you go, wear sturdy shoes, stay on marked paths, be mindful of other walkers, and keep a small amount of water in your pack. If visibility is poor, consider postponing.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and summer

seo.meta_description: Explore the Muir to Clash Circuit, a short 0.3 km easy hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners and families, featuring flat terrain, simple safety tips, and essential gear.
